Room.Name: Main Courtyard East
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the east side of Castle Ragnar's main courtyard.
Room.LongDescription: A small alcove in the east wall leads to an apothecary shoppe. Partially blocking the way to the south is a bright red and white striped tent whose entrance appears to be around to the south. A great oaken tree grows here, long ago having burst from the floor and put roots down through the stone crevices. A number of crows and ravens inhabit the upper limbs of the tree.
